page.title: 10HURSLEY SHOPS
page.content: Mrs.Howick is the owner of the bakery. She has been running it for six years. The bakery has been run by her family for 45 years which is four generations. The bakery was built 125 years ago in the late 18th century. She bakes the bread on the premises in old-fashioned kilns in the walls. When the bread has been cooked they slice it in a bread-slicing machine which has metal teeth.Her trade is based on selling {bread,cakes, jam tarts and {buns }to about one thousand customers per week. Most of her customers are local but before now there have been people from France, Devon, S.Wales and Wiltshire who have wanted to buy her bread particularly. Mr. Bell has been running the Newsbox for four years. He sells { {sweets, cigarettes stationery,drinks {and icecreams.}
